title: Linux unrar Command with Practical Examples
description: Explore the Linux unrar command and learn how to extract single and multi-part RAR archives on Ubuntu 22.04. Gain practical experience with this essential file compression and archiving tool.

meta.title: Linux unrar Command with Practical Examples
meta.description: Explore the Linux unrar command and learn how to extract single and multi-part RAR archives on Ubuntu 22.04. Gain practical experience with this essential file compression and archiving tool.
meta.keywords: Linux, unrar, RAR, archive, compression, extraction, Ubuntu, command line

verify.name: Verify unrar package installation
verify.hint: The unrar package does not appear to be installed. Please run the installation command again.

verify.name: Verify extraction of single RAR file
verify.hint: The example.txt file was not extracted from the RAR archive. Please check your unrar command and try again.

verify.name: Verify extraction of multi-part RAR archive
verify.hint: The example.txt file was not extracted from the multi-part RAR archive. Please check your unrar command and try again.
